job_summary: Aligned with Finance Operations vertical to support financial outcomes through vendor invoice and payment processing, reconciliations, audit compliance, and ensuring accurate accounting across procure-to-pay activities.
role_detailes: Process vendor invoices and credit notes within agreed timelines.
Validate and identify non-compliant invoices, raising queries to stakeholders.
Perform vendor reconciliations, GRIR reconciliations, and month-end tasks.
Process PO invoices (2-way/3-way match) and Non-PO invoices with required approvals.
Conduct duplicate payment audit checks and root cause analysis.
Manage payment runs, urgent payments, and vendor refunds.
Ensure controls, compliance, audit readiness, and documentation are maintained.
Coordinate with Vendor Master and Banking teams for issue resolution.
Note: Candidate must be ready to work night shifts and should have good knowledge of MS Excel and Procure-to-Pay domain systems.
skills_expected: Month End Close tasks in Procure to Pay
Experience in Great Plains, AS400 & Navision

job_summary: Aligned with Finance Operations vertical, this role involves supporting end-to-end Record to Report processes such as journal entry posting, balance sheet reconciliations, cash forecasting, month-end closing, and audit support to ensure accuracy and compliance in financial reporting.
role_detailes: Post journal entries and manage bookkeeping activities.
Prepare and review balance sheet reconciliations.
Support cash forecasting and reporting activities.
Assist in variance analysis and provide comments for trial balance movements.
Perform intercompany, FA, and lease-related activities.
Support month-end closing, including reconciliations and reporting.
Ensure compliance with controls and assist in audits.
Collaborate with stakeholders and team members to manage deliverables.
May require rotational shifts as per business requirements.
Note: Candidate should have strong knowledge of accounting fundamentals, general ledger, reconciliations, and be flexible to work in rotational shifts.

job_summary: As part of the Finance Operations vertical, this role focuses on risk management in finance and accounting. Responsibilities include analyzing operational data, assessing and mitigating risks, supporting general accounting practices, and applying agile-based risk management approaches to ensure continuous project delivery.
role_detailes: Assist in identifying, categorizing, and mitigating potential risks in financial processes and projects.
Collect operational data and reports for analysis and reconciliation of transactions.
Support general accounting practices under supervision.
Apply agile risk management practices within project roles, artifacts, and workflows.
Contribute to contingency planning and issue resolution to minimize financial risk.
Perform routine problem-solving with close supervision.
Collaborate with the team and direct supervisor for assigned tasks.
Act as an individual contributor within a narrow scope of work.
May be required to work in rotational shifts.
Note: This is an entry-level position, suitable for fresh graduates who wish to gain exposure in Finance Operations and Risk Management.

job_summary: Aligned with the Customer Support vertical to manage and resolve customer queries, handle escalations and complaints, and ensure closure of issues within SLA timelines through effective communication over multiple channels.
role_detailes: Resolve routine customer queries and escalations through chat, email, calls.
Handle dissatisfied customers and provide best-in-class resolutions.
Close customer complaints and faults within defined SLA timelines.
Communicate with customers across multiple channels such as phone, chat, email, and face-to-face where required.
Collaborate with the team and supervisor for guidance and escalation handling.
Work as an individual contributor focused on clear scope work tasks.
Adhere to detailed instructions for new assignments and standard procedures.
Note: Candidate must be open to working in rotational shifts and should be good at email, chat handling, and typing.
skills_expected: Ability to work well in a team
Typing efficiency (preferred for chat and email processes)

job_summary: Support business operations by assisting with measurement frameworks, reporting, and ensuring accurate data analysis for performance tracking.
role_detailes: Assist in preparing business performance reports.
Ensure data accuracy and process adherence.
Collaborate with internal teams to gather metrics and KPIs.
Build dashboards and support reporting automation projects.
Note: Freshers and candidates up to 2 years’ experience are eligible.

Collaborate with team members to improve service delivery and enhance client experience.

Understanding of SLAs and ticket lifecycle

Strong written and verbal client communication

job_summary: As a Trust & Safety Associate, you will be responsible for analyzing and reviewing user profiles, audio, video, and text-based content, investigating issues flagged by users or systems, and ensuring a secure and positive online environment while adhering to client guidelines.
role_detailes: Review, classify, and/or remove content according to client guidelines using specific tools and channels.
Analyze and investigate sensitive or objectionable content, ensuring compliance with policies.
Escalate complex content issues to the Trust & Safety team.
Remain updated on evolving client policies and moderation standards.
Ensure decisions are objective and free from personal bias.
Safeguard user experience while upholding platform safety.
Note: The role involves exposure to potentially sensitive or objectionable content (e.g., graphic, violent, sexual). Emotional resilience, stress-management skills, and participation in well-being support programs are essential.
mandatory: Strong coping, emotional resilience, and stress-management skills
skills_expected: Ability to establish strong client relationships
Objective decision-making devoid of personal biases
Attention to detail and information analysis
2-3 years of customer support experience via phone, email, and chat
Experience in B2C (B2B knowledge is an advantage)
Customer service mindset with focus on customer experience

job_summary: As an Application Tech Support Practitioner, act as the ongoing interface between the client and systems/applications, using exceptional communication skills to ensure smooth system functioning and timely resolution of client issues.
role_detailes: Lead and manage high-severity incidents affecting SAP's cloud environments with rapid coordination and escalation.
Serve as central point of contact during major incidents ensuring collaboration across teams.
Use ServiceNow, cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP), and monitoring tools for incident management.
Conduct post-incident reviews and collaborate for root cause analysis and problem management.
Prioritize and manage multiple tasks effectively with attention to business continuity and operational resilience.
Note: Requires minimum 5 years of experience in infrastructure service management and preferably ITIL Foundation certification. Based in Bengaluru office with 15 years full-time education requirement.
mandatory: Minimum 5 years of experience in infrastructure service management
